title: Gta 3 and Vice city (no install runs from dvd)
description:
Live dvd containing the following games:

-Grand theft auto 3
-Grand theft auto vice city

(please note that these games boot directly from dvd so you do not have to install them, or if you do wish to install them simply copy and paste the game files...
to install vice city copy the folder named &#039;Grand Theft Auto Vice City&#039; onto your 
documents or program files folder, to install gta 3 copy the folder named &#039;GTA3&#039; onto your documents or program files folder.
